name: kickstart-template
title: Kickstart template
description: Kickstart template for my website developments.

scripts.build: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro check; export $(cat .env.prod) && astro build;
scripts.build:local: npm run clean; astro telemetry disable; astro check; export $(cat .env.local) && astro build;
scripts.update: npm i @astrojs/check @astrojs/mdx @astrojs/netlify @astrojs/node @astrojs/sitemap @astrojs/tailwind @astrojs/vercel astro dotenv tailwindcss typescript
